name: ESI Challan
query:
SELECT 
	esic_no,
    employee_name,
    round(payment_days) payment_days,
    round(gross_pay- IFNULL( (select amount from `tabSalary Detail` td where td.parent=
    `tabSalary Slip`.name and td.abbr='WA' ),0)) esi_earnings,
    (if(payment_days>0,0,1)) workings_day,
    esic_exit_date as last_working_day
FROM
	`tabSalary Slip`    
WHERE length(esic_no) > 3 AND   end_date = %(end_date)s
	AND  ISNULL(esic_exit_date) 
	AND `tabSalary Slip`.docstatus < 2 
	AND ( SELECT amount FROM  `tabSalary Detail` tsd WHERE tsd.parent = `tabSalary Slip`.name and  tsd.abbr = 'ESI' ) > 0
	AND company = %(company)s
UNION
SELECT 
	esic_no,
    employee_name,
    0 payment_days,
    0 esi_earnings,
    2 workings_day,
    esic_exit_date as last_working_day
FROM tabEmployee
WHERE length(esic_no) > 3 AND company = %(company)s AND 
      ( MONTH(esic_exit_date) = MONTH(DATE_ADD(%(end_date)s, INTERVAL -1 MONTH))  AND YEAR(esic_exit_date) = YEAR(DATE_ADD(%(end_date)s, INTERVAL -1 MONTH)) )
